name: Chuck Yeetus 1.0
description:
CHUCK YEETUS

Chuck Yeetus is a fun couch co-op game where the player takes on the persona of Chuck & Peg Yeetus, two sibling hillbilly farmers. Together they need to return their wayward animals to their pens by way of a Trebuchet.

As the players proceed through the game’s different levels, they will unlock optional challenges that will earn them a higher score.

Ultimately, Chuck Yeetus is a hilarious game that is sure to bring those who play it many opportunities for silliness and laughter.


A group project consisting of 5 people, completed for the University of Canberra's Bachelor of Game Design.
